item.title: Class 2
item.description: opening project in sublime first open sublime editor. File > open folder boilerplate / starter tag 4 html head title body heading (h1 - h6) paragraph (p) bold / strong (b, strong) italic / emphasize (i, em) horizontal row (hr) break (br) anchor (a) image tag basic rule Whatever we can achieve through in css, we should use css not html. basic html boilerplate code <html> <head> <title>Document</title> </head> <body> </body> </html> html 5 starter / boilerplate code <!
